DOC.brief_summary: The effect education response probe meal ( 250 mL vegetable soup cook low temperature 25 g bread ) study parallel design . The effect education test two different group random order : real versus sham education . In group response probe meal test 2 different day intervention . Participants instruct eat standard dinner day , consume standard breakfast home overnight fast , report laboratory , probe meal administer 3 h breakfast . Studies conduct quiet , isolated room participant sit chair . Perception measure 5 min interval 10 min 20 min ingestion 10 min interval 60 min probe meal .
DOC.criteria: nonobese history gastrointestinal symptom prior obesity use medication history anosmia ageusia current diet alcohol abuse psychological disorder eat disorder
